skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 25% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn. This chance increases by 15% per each buff placed on this Champion.
skills.name: Fickle Courage

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Steals all buffs from each enemy, then transfers all debuffs from this Champion to a random enemy. Then applies a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking all debuffs from that enemy and placing them on all enemies.
skills.name: Mirror Universe

skills.desc: Exchanges remaining HP levels with a target enemy.
skills.name: Meddle with Fate

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]

skills.desc: Damage from Continuous Damage decreased by 60%.
skills.name: Continuous Damage Resistance II
